about.heading: About
about.intro1: Product leader focused on building AI-powered products that drive measurable outcomes. Currently shaping AI strategy at Skillshare, with a track record of shipped products across EdTech and community platforms.
about.intro2: I thrive in ambiguity—taking on multiple complex initiatives, moving fast with limited resources, and finding creative solutions when priorities shift. Recognized for resilience, agility, and cross-functional impact.

work.heading: Work
work.noProjects: No projects found in this category.

approach.heading: How I Work
approach.whatIBring: What I Bring to the Table
approach.subtitle: Rated "Exceeding High Expectations" for managing behemoth projects through organizational change.
approach.intro1: I'm a high-agency builder who takes on complex, ambiguous projects and ships fast. When priorities shift mid-flight, I adapt quickly and keep multiple initiatives moving forward. I don't wait for perfect conditions—I find creative ways to ship with the resources I have.
approach.intro2: My approach: Run discovery that actually informs decisions. Work closely with engineering to figure out what's possible. Build the right-sized solution, not the perfect one. Ship fast, learn fast, iterate.
approach.thriveIntro: I'm most valuable in environments that need fast execution through ambiguity:

excel.zeroToOneDesc: Build from nothing, ship fast, prove value quickly
excel.ambiguousDesc: Thrive when the path isn't clear, frame problems, find creative solutions
excel.scrappyDesc: Ship with limited resources through creative problem-solving
excel.multipleDesc: Juggle behemoth projects simultaneously without creating bottlenecks

values.biasDesc: Ship and learn beats planning to perfection
values.userRealityDesc: Discovery that connects to actual behavior, not just opinions
values.crossFunctionalDesc: Unblock teams beyond my core role, act as a force multiplier

thrive.earlyStageDesc: that need to prove value quickly with limited resources
thrive.zeroToOneDesc: launching new product lines or experimental initiatives
thrive.aiFirstDesc: building products where the path isn't obvious and iteration is key
thrive.growthStageDesc: navigating rapid scaling and multiple pivots

contact.heading: Contact
contact.intro: Open to discussing product leadership roles, AI product strategy, and interesting challenges in EdTech and community platforms.

info.title: About Content Language
info.description: This setting determines which language will be used by default when generating resumes and cover letters. You can always change it for individual documents.
